((Sorry about that I'm taking nighttime college class and day time high 
school I had a research paper due for night school. Also friday I may not 
post all day sorry my friend registered us in a Marvel Vs. Capcom 2 and The 
Bouncer Tournoment and since I'm his partner well he counting on me to carry 
my weight. I might try to rest up a bit. Excuse my grammer its late.))

::Liono::
"Damn there going to beat us there Void trigger the Firewall" Liono switches 
the ship to auto pilot and heads to the weapons bay takes 4  Large missiles 
disarms the warheads.

::The Ark and Void::
The Ark sit solemn amidst the tranquillity of space as it remains testament 
to the Autobots.  There is no sign of hostile intent as space debris drifts 
endless by the vastness of space. The surface of the Ark�s surface glitters 
like a diamond in rough as a closer scan of the surface reveals thick 
patches of ice that have settled on the ship with time. The dark side of the 
moon gentle adds to aura of the ship and the wonderment of the scene. Void 
analyzes Liono command �Your last command is illogical but I will obey.� 
Void back at Cats Lair her eyes slow change from white to cool water blue as 
she waves her hand.((After you enter the Radius of the Ark space you with 
the space minefield.)) Four rocks that are just drifting in the minefield 
blow apart to reveal 4 autoguns, as they don�t target you they target the 
space mines. The autoguns fire on as many mines as possible setting them off 
in a chain reaction off exploding mines shooting and jagged SHARDS OF METAL 
everywhere. The explosion from all the mines going off in sink is  creating 
what looks like a wall of plasma or wave energy rushing towards the 
Astroblast ((This is a one post attacks its not a stable defense.)) and the 
Cat ships as it spreads out as more mines go off wave of high power plasma.

::The cat ships::
The two WildCats ships as the shake violently as jagged shard of metal rips 
through as the ship seem to have taken heave damage.

::Liono::
Liono Finishes Disarming the missiles warheads "Dark, Me, and 
Bluestinger,Rinoa will ride ahead in these we have a chance of beating them 
there the wave should slow them down alot more than us there in a living 
ship.

::Liono,Dark,Bluestinger,Rinoa::
Climb in to the hollow missile shells and get ready to be launched.

::Koj::
Finishes disarming 2 warheads "Me and Lilly will be right with you."

::Koj and Lilly::
Koj and Lilly climb into there own missile shells with the dragons each 
being carried as a armor on their master.

::Key and Tigerhawk::
Key lauches the missiles for Liono's ship and Tigerhawk launches for Koj 
ship. As the missiles with the WildCats inside rocket of towards the Ark 
gain ground extremely fast.
